songs.title: Favorite Girl (Acoustic) [Live]
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Love you too
Alright, can you turn on my guitar in my ears please? Thank you
You guys ready? Are you sure?
Alright, let's go

[Verse 1]
I always knew you were the best, the coolest girl I know
So prettier than all the rest, the star of my show
So many times I wished, you'd be the one for me
But never knew it'd get like this, girl what you do to me?

[Pre-Chorus]
You're who I'm thinking of
And girl you ain't my runner up
And no matter what
You're always number one

[Chorus]
My prize possession, one and only
Adore you, girl I want you
The one I can't live without
That's you, that's you
You're my special little lady
The one that makes me crazy
Of all the girls I've ever known
It's you, it's you
My favourite, my favourite
My favourite, my favourite girl
My favourite girl

[Verse 2]
You're always going out your way to impress these Mr. Wrongs
But you can be yourself with me, I'll take you as you are
I know they said believe in love, it's a dream that can’t be real
So girl let's write a fairytale and show 'em how we feel

[Pre-Chorus]
You're who I'm thinking of
And girl you ain't my runner up
And no matter what
You're always number one

[Chorus]
My prize possession, one and only
Adore you, girl I want you
The one I can't live without
That's you, that's you
You're my special little lady
The one that makes me crazy
Of all the girls I've ever known
It's you, it's you
Woah, I want you
It's you, it's you, oh

[Interlude]
You know Dan right? Guitar solo Dan, let's go
Give it up for Dan, @DanKanter

My favourite, my favourite
My favourite, my favourite girl
My favourite girl

[Bridge]
You take my breath away with everything you say
I just want to be with you, my baby my baby, oh
Promise to play no games, treat you no other way
Than you deserve cause you're the girl of my dreams, yeah

[Chorus]
My favourite, my favourite
My favourite, my favourite girl
My favourite girl
It's you

[Outro]
Thank you
